pkgmetadata.longdescription: Driving Offences in New Zealand Between 2009 and 2016 // Datasets of driving offences and fines in New Zealand between 2009 and 2017. Originally published by the New Zealand Police at http://www.police.govt.nz/about-us/publication/road-policing- driver-offence-data-january-2009-december-2017.
